response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs. The product offers exceptional benefits and value, tailored to enhance your operations or personal endeavors significantly. Given its high quality and the exclusive nature of this offering, we believe it is worth $800,000 to you. However, to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I am proposing to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my objective to recover a substantial portion of its cost and investment. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal and hope to facilitate a successful exchange.", "product_price": 950000}
